title: Distt admin denies closure of schools in ICT
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 17 (APP): The District Administration of Islamabad has clarified that all educational institutions will remain open, dismissing rumors about their closure.
According to the spokesman of ICT administration, the authority has rejected reports circulating about the closure of schools in the Federal Capital. He confirmed that educational institutions will operate as usual tomorrow.
The administration has urged the public not to believe in unverified news.
The clarification came after rumors of school closures spread in the city, causing concern among parents and students. The spokesman advised citizens to rely only on official sources for accurate information.
The administration emphasized that Islamabad schools will continue their regular schedule, urging people not to be misled by false claims.
